description:
This is a video recording of Francis Jehl discussing his experience working with Thomas Edison in 1879 and helping to make the first practically viable light bulb in history.  Mr. Jehl was born in 1860 and began working with Mr. Edison in 1878 at the age of 18.  

My other history channel "The History Zone"
Historical videos from all time periods.
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzZFjYqo7lt5Nwi2-Toe8kA
title: I Helped Make the First Useful Light Bulb in 1879 - Recorded in 1932
